name: landholder
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who owns or rents an area of land: MGM Mirage is the largest landholder on the Las Vegas strip. Brazil requires landholders in Amazon forest areas to maintain half of their land in forest. See
landholding
More examplesFewer examplesThe company became a major landholder in the West.The largest private landholder in the state of Florida is giving the area a makeover.They were land holders at last, with almost five hundred acres to their names.
